DOC.detailed_description: The investigator collect 165 acute stroke patient suffer stroke within one month potential rehabilitation . The participant divide mild , moderate severe group accord Modified Rankin Scale ( MRS ) . The patient admit 6 week extend 12 week necessary evaluation . Comprehensive rehabilitation program include Physical Therapy ( PT ) , Occupational Therapy ( OT ) Speech Therapy ( ST ) do two hour every day 5 day per week 6-12 week . Initial assessment do within 3 day follow assessment do 6 week 12 week rehabilitation intervention physician well-trained therapist . We collect basic data include sex , age , etiology stroke , affected side , premorbid functional condition , onset time , initial function admission , Brunnstrom stage , Charlson Comorbidity Scoring intensity rehabilitation . Functional assessment include : Modified Rankin Scale ( MRS ) ; Barthel Index ; swallow feed function , Mini Nutrition Assessment ; Euro QoL-5D ; Lawton-Brody IADL Scale ; Berg Balance Scale ( BBS ) ; Gait speed ; 6 minute walk test ; Revised Nottingham sensory assessment ( RNSA ) ; Mini-mental state examination ( MMSE ) ; Motor Activity Log ( MAL ) ; Canadian Occupational Performance Measurement ( COPM ) ; aphasia evaluation . Data analysis do two-way ANOVA , pair test , regression multiple variant analysis .
